app_description.message: Hiding unsolicited information on on websites as part of the "For Safe Internet for Children" program

keyboardShortcutToggle.description: Keyboard shortcut, toggles between Enabled and Disabled Sites Cleaner.

keyboardShortcutIgnore.message: Toggle ignoring Sites Cleaner for current domain
keyboardShortcutIgnore.description: Keyboard shortcut, toggles whether the current domain is on the ignore Sites Cleaner.

donate.description: Option displayed in popup, opens a popup window to paypal.
